msbt.message:
Ugh, I just can't seem to find
anywhere!Did I scare them off and they're all hiding, ? I wonder what happened?
I can help! I'll catch one for you!
You can do this! Good luck!
Someone said if I wanna be pro, I should study .I could figure out all its sweet movesif I could catch one
I'll get one for you! I'll catch one for you!
You can do it! Go get 'em!
No matter HOW HARD I TRY, I just can't catch !Maybe they're hiding from me? But where?! It's like I'm always in the wrong place!Floppy fishsticks! <10_4 />Forget catching ! I can't catch a break!
I could catch one? I'll catch one for you!
You'll find one. Well, good luck!
I'm looking for new ideas for pro- level . I really wanna study !The way it moves is so awesomely cool, butI can't seem to catch one.
I'll get ya one! I'll catch one for you!
Keep trying! You can do it!
You deserve a ribbon for sportsman- like behavior. I know I have a few somewhere I'll look around!Meanwhile, good luck!
Yes! You're a real athlete! OK, good luck!
Really? Awesome! Good luck, !
Really?! Way to play ball. Don't hold back, !
OK. You've got a workout regime to keep up, and your muscle tone's more important than my problem.
Pfft, no go! Well, I shouldn't rely on other folks. I'll look for one myself, !
Thanks for the pep talk! I'll keep trying, !
Thanks! You make me believe I can do this myself, !

Horned beetles have such cool bodies, don't they? Super strong. I bet their workouts are <10_5 />INTENSE!Hey, you're a future bug catcher celebrity. I need a horned beetle so I can learn its ways. Get me one?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Did you know that the scissors on a stag beetle are actually its JAWS?I wonder what kind of training I could do to build up my jaw like that? Chew rocks maybe?That's a terrible idea! Ugh. If I had a stag beetle, I could study its style. Like a kung-fu master. For my jaw.You're good at catching bugs, yes? Could you catch me a stag beetle? Any kind will do, .
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Cicadas must have amazing abdominal muscles to produce a sound like that!Maybe if I practice making the same noiseI could tone my six-pack. Call me Cicada Abs!Hey, could you grab a cicada for me? And for my abs, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Butterflies fly because they have strong arms! And also wings.Butterflies are also the most beautiful creatures ever.If I made my own butterfly wings, maybe I could get stronger arms Andbe beautifulListen, , can you get me a butterfly? Any kind will do. It just needs to be a butterfly.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Dragonflies are super quick, aren't they? Right when you think you're close enough to catch oneZOOM! They fly away! If I only knew the secret to their explosive speedHey, ? You're an ace bug catcher. Could you catch a dragonfly for me? Any kind will do.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

You're a future Hall of Fame bug catcher, right, ?I'd really like the type of bug that lands on flowersbut I'd knock the petals off if I tried to catch one!Too much upper body strength, y'know? I can't be expected to hold back, !Still I need any type of bug that lands on flowers. Could you catch me one? Any kind will do!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
Weird I haven't been able to find any bugs on stumps. It's like they all forgot it was game day.You're a future bug-catching star. Could you catch me a bug sitting on a stump, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
I've been looking for a freshwater fish, but I haven't been able to find any for some reason! You're a future fishing champion, right? Could you catch a freshwater fish for me, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Ocean fish are so athletically dynamic! They dart around and sometimes fly up out of the water!Studying their moves, I guarantee I could get better at !But I haven't been able to catch one!Hey, you're a future fishing big shot Could you get an ocean fish for me, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I can't find
ANYWHERE!Hate to bug you, but could you catch
for me, ?
I'm on it! You bet!
Can't right now... Sorry. Not right now.
I haven't been able to find a single latelyBut I need one! My bug collection isn't complete without !Where could one be?
I'll got you! I'll catch one for you!
Gotta keep looking! You'll find one!
It's the end of the championships, the other team's up by , and you're gonna carry us to victory!Wellyou're gonna carry a bug to me. You got this, !
OK. I'll keep looking more myself. Don't worry about it, !
Huh? You sure? That'll be play of the year material! Thanks, ! .
That's OK I'll keep looking on my own. Later, !
I've been trying to catch , but I haven't been able to yet!You're my rival, so I hate to askbut would you catch for me?
I'm on it! You betcha!
Can't right now... I can't. Sorry!
Hey, you. You know about the elusive , right?I've been in a slump lately, and I've been strikin' out instead of rolling strikes, if you get me
I can catch it for you! I never strike out!
You'll get it! Um, I gotta go.
Thanks, ! I knew you'd be up for a challenge!<10_4 /> Good luck, !
Don't worry about it! If my rival thinks they can't do it, that's inspiration for me to try harder!
You know what, ? I'll catch one sooner or later! See you around!
